message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a starting price of $11,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to consider that?
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9,800?
